the art is all so pretty, but i feel kind of irked at the artists who made taliyah appear pale.. 
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

The purpose of art is that people can create it however they like. I personally don't feel the artists were making her actual skin pale but more of a reflection of the snowy environment of the Freijord theme. Everyone gets rosy cheeks and looks a little pale w/ snow/moonlight reflecting off their skin

Shoutouts to the artist that can make better splash arts than riot. Also making taliyah have a normal nose and face.

Nobody likes Taliyah's nose, but I think it's purposeful. Flaws are an integral part of a character; it would have been easy for Riot to make a "regular cute girl", but I see Taliyah's nose as a hallmark, something that makes her instantly recognizable even when she doesn't have her earth-mage outfit. I mean, it's not aesthetically pleasing, but I'm okay with that, just as I'm okay with Katarina's scar, or Fiora's accent.
 {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
